com.nutiteq.components
Class CullState

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.components.CullState

public class CullState
extends java.lang.Object

View-specific state determined by the culling process. This includes convex envelope of the visible area, zoom level, camera state.

Field Summary
 CameraState camera
          Camera state for the view
 Envelope envelope
          Envelope for the visible area in internal coordinates.
 RenderProjection renderProjection
          Current render projection
 int zoom
          Discrete zoom level for the view.
 
Constructor Summary
CullState(Envelope envelope, CameraState camera, RenderProjection renderProjection)
          Default constructor
 

Field Detail

envelope

public final Envelope envelope
Envelope for the visible area in internal coordinates.

zoom

public final int zoom
Discrete zoom level for the view. Note: this is calculated from camera state

camera

public final CameraState camera
Camera state for the view

renderProjection

public RenderProjection renderProjection
Current render projection

Constructor Detail

                 CameraState camera,
                 RenderProjection renderProjection)
Default constructor

Parameters:
envelope - envelope for the visible area.
